Name: Asparagus (PH)
Description: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.

DescriptionLocalization.es: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Diese Stängel sind reich an Nährstoffen und werden jung geerntet, bevor sie eine holzige Struktur annehmen.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.
DescriptionLocalization.it: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Стебли спаржи богаты питательными веществами. Собирать их следует молодыми, иначе они обретут древесную текстуру.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: These stalks are high in nutrients, and harvested young before they acquire a woody texture.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这些茎杆富含营养，在形成木质结构之前收获。
